sections.text:
23-2009.County officers; suspension pending trial; vacancy; how filled.

When the accused is an officer of the court, and is suspended, the court may supply his place by appointment for the term.

SourceR.S.1866, c. 45, § 9, p. 298;R.S.1913, § 5706;C.S.1922, § 5036;C.S.1929, § 26-1709;R.S.1943, § 23-2009.

Annotations

"Suspended", as used in this section, is not synonymous with "removed", as used in first section of article. State ex rel. Dodson v. Meeker, 19 Neb. 444, 27 N.W. 427 (1886).
